text.div:
careplan-activity-outcomereference

Parameter activity-outcomereference:reference

To alow a search (_include) resources that are use to describe outcomes of CarePlan activities..

ResourceCarePlan
ExpressionCarePlan.activity.outcomeReference
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: careplan-activity-outcomereference
purpose: To search on a outcome Resource, referenced from a CarePlan.activity.outcomeReference. Main purpose is to use this search parameter for including outcome related resouces in the result for a search on CarePlan.
description: To alow a search (_include) resources that are use to describe outcomes of CarePlan activities..
